member.summary: Determines what character will be used for splitting based on cell in csv. Deafult is ';'.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.InputWriteExcel.lineDelimiter
member.summary: Determines what string will be used for splitting lines. Default is "\r\n".

member.name: P:Frends.Office.InputWriteExcel.includeHeaders
member.summary: If input csv includes column names (headers). Type boolean.
